Time of Day based on Season

From the Four Seasons Mod.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If enabled, the mod changes the Animated Time of Day based on the current Season. Enabled is recommended to improve the immersion of the Season.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Once the game started, deactivate animated time of day in the options to make this work properly.
